This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS CORS request with setRequestHeader auth to URL accepting Authorization header
FAIL CORS request with setRequestHeader auth to URL NOT accepting Authorization header Failed to execute 'send' on 'XMLHttpRequest': Failed to load 'http://www1.web-platform.test:8001/xhr/resources/auth8/corsenabled-no-authorize.py'.
Harness: the test ran to completion.
